entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 2:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
